article.@class: twentyseventeen-panel post-611 page type-page status-publish hentry

rs-layer.p: Celebrating 100 years of steel strong customer relations.

div.p: 1930s period between the two world wars was an era of growth and financial progress of Karachi. The era provided a golden opportunity to keep MEK abreast with the technical know-how of that time and to expand its manufacturing facilities.
MEK manufacturing plant located at Lyari, Karachi.
Mulla Ebrahimji Karimbhoy, the founding father of MEK. Picture taken in 1951 by his son Mohsin MEK.
MEK factory was located at Ireland Road Karachi in a rented warehouse. Mohsin bhai is seen with a group of manufacturing staff.

MEK participated in many 
expos and exhibitions to showcase the product lines being manufactured. The picture is of expo held during the golden jubilee celebration of our holiness Syedna Tahir Saifuddin at Tayyabi Jamaatkhana, Karachi in 1962.

In the mid 1960s, after the retirement of Mulla Ebrahimji Karimbhoy, his son Mohsin bhai took over the reins of the company. during Mohsin bhais era, new manufacturing facility was developed at Lyari. New products were launched such as safe deposit lockers and strong room doors that were 
earlier imported from the united kingdom and India. In the picture taken in 1970s, Mohsin MEK is seen sitting in his office. the show room was than located at Serai road.
Manufacturing facilities were expanded with the shifting to the larger company-owned factory in Lyari, Karachi

The growing law and order problems in Lyari compelled the company to develop a new manufacturing facility at Korangi creek Industrial park, Karachi. The construction and development of this new facility started in 2013 and the manufacturing of products started in 2017.

The launching of this new facility also coincided with the changing of guards. Forth generation was successfully incorporated in 
the management of company who are contributing and leading the growth of MEK towards the new horizon.

div.h3: MEK Pakistan ISO 9001: 2008 Certified. One of most modern & quality.
p:
MEK is the leading provider of quality steel products since 1921. We are a customer centric, full-service organization offering 
steel equipment and storage solutions supplemented with project management, engineering, design and installation services. Spread of over approx. 50,
                                                                                                                                                        000 sq. ft. our manufacturing facility situated at the industrial area of Korangi is fully equipped with advanced machinery including hydraulic metal benders and cutters and an in-house powder coating plant.

div.p: Find products for your customers, not customers for your product.
